Air_Bomb.display_help: You have been knocked back by the explosion and are on fire.

Assault.display_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork. You are partially resistant to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.
Assault.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's damage potential and resistance to Taunt and Placate.

Granite_Armor.display_help: When you activate this power, you are transformed into a massive bulk of unyielding Granite. Your incredible mass makes you almost completely invulnerable and resistant to most effects. However, you also become quite heavy, cannot fly, your attack and movement speed are Slowed and you do less damage. Granite Armor also grants you high resistance to Defense DeBuffs.Cannot be active at the same time as other Armors in this set, Fly powers, Sprint, Super Speed, or Jump powers. Recharge: Slow
Granite_Armor.display_attacker_hit: Your Granite Armor has made you practically invulnerable!

Earths_Embrace.display_help: You are so connected to the Earth, you can draw upon its power to add to your own health. Activating this power increases your maximum Hit Points, and grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
Earths_Embrace.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your maximum Hit Points.

Mud_Pots.display_help: While this power is active, you draw upon the geothermal power of the Earth to create a bubbling pool of hot mud around yourself. All foes in melee range will become snared and entrapped in the mud, Immobilizing some and slowing others. The boiling heat from Mud Pots also deals some damage over time to the snared foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Mud_Pots.display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Minor DoT(Fire), Foe Immobilize, -SPD
Mud_Pots.display_target_help: The Mud Pots are burning you and reducing your Running speed. You may be immobilized, as well.

Quicksand.display_help: Your Running speed, Jump height and Defense are reduced by the Quicksand.

Stone_Prison.display_help: Immobilizes a single target within an earthy formation and deals some Smashing damage over time. Some more resilient foes may require multiple attacks to Immobilize. Stone Prison can also reduce a target's Defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Stone_Prison.display_target_help: You are being crushed by a Stone Prison. You are immobile and cannot fly. Your Defenses are reduced.

Fossilize.display_help: Encases a single target within solid stone. The stone slowly crushes the victim, dealing Smashing damage. The Fossilized victim is held helpless and unable to defend himself. Damage, Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Fossilize.display_target_help: You have been Fossilized and are held. Your Defenses are reduced.

Stone_Fist.display_help: Your stone covered fists attack swiftly for moderate damage, and may Disorient your opponent. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Stone_Fist.display_short_help: Melee Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient

Tremor.display_help: You can cause a localized earthquake immediately around you. This will deal moderate damage to every foe in melee range, while knocking them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Seismic_Smash.display_help: This massive attack hits with all the force of the Earth itself. It deals tremendous amounts of damage, and may Hold the target if they are not defeated outright. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Seismic_Smash.display_target_help: You have been immobilized by the crushing earth.

Power_Bolt.display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.display_target_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

Power_Blast.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Power_Beam.display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Beam.display_target_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Explosive_Blast.display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.display_target_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Power_Burst.display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.display_target_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

Gloom.display_help: Gloom slowly drains a target of life, while reducing his Accuracy. Slower than Dark Blast, but deals more damage over time. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
Gloom.display_target_help: The Gloom is causing damage to you and reducing your Accuracy.

Twilight_Grasp.display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate
Twilight_Grasp.display_target_help: The Twilight Grasp has reduced your Accuracy and Damage potential.

Night_Fall.display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Night_Fall.display_target_help: Night Fall has reduced your Accuracy.

Fearsome_Stare.display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.display_target_help: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

Petrifying_Gaze.display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow
Petrifying_Gaze.display_target_help: The Petrifying Gaze has stopped you in your tracks!
Petrifying_Gaze.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} attempts to Hold you with a Petrifying Gaze.

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce his Accuracy. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Dark_Servant.display_help: Summons a Dark Servant to your aid. The Dark Servant possesses an assortment of dark powers to weaken your foes. The summoned entity is not a willing servant, and it is only your power that binds it in this realm. The Dark Servant can be buffed and healed. Recharge: Very Long
Dark_Servant.display_short_help: Summon Dark Servant: Ranged Debuff Special

Blackstar.display_help: You can unleash a devastating blast of Negative Energy around yourself, dealing massive damage and severely reducing affected foes' Accuracy. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Blackstar.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Blackstar.

Psi-Bomb.display_help: You are stunned and possibly confused.

Storm_Kick.display_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.
Storm_Kick.display_target_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.

Shurikens.display_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.
Shurikens.display_target_help: Three thrown dagger that can hit multiple targets.

Focused_Fighting.display_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Focused_Fighting.display_target_help: You become more evasive to melee and ranged attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Inner_Focus.display_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.
Inner_Focus.display_target_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged attacks, area effect attacks and cone shaped attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

Crane_Kick.display_help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!
Crane_Kick.display_target_help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!

Exploding_Shuriken.display_help: This small throwing star is rigged to explode on impact. You must have two other Weapon Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

Dragons_Tail.display_help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Dragons_Tail.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

Quickness.display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Quickness.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Elude.display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.display_target_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased. When Elude wears off, you are left drained of all Endurance and unable to Recover Endurance for a while. Recharge: Slow
Elude.display_attacker_hit: You are now extremely Elusive, and almost impossible to hit, however, you are too preoccupied to attack foes or assist his allies.

Curse_of_Weariness.display_help: You are tired. Your endurance total has been reduced.

Burst.display_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Submachine Gun.

Plasma_Blast.display_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

Willie_Pete_Round.display_help: This explosion from this Fragmentation Grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.

SIGIL_Round.display_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.
SIGIL_Round.display_target_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

Flashbang_Grenades.display_help: You've been partially blinded by the Flashbang Grenades. Your Accuracy and Defense are reduced.

Life_Drain.display_help: You can tap the power of the Netherworld to steal some life from a target foe and reduce his Accuracy. Some of that stolen life is transferred to you in the form of Hit Points. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Life_Drain.display_target_help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by the Life Drain.

Freezing_Sphere.display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's Accuracy. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
Freezing_Sphere.display_target_help: Your Accuracy, Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Freezing Sphere.

Ice_Blast.display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Ice_Blast.display_target_help: Your Attack rate and Running speed are reduced by the Ice Blast.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Your Endurance has been drained and are in a state of shock.

Defense_Aura.display_help: Your Endurance has been drained and are in a state of shock.

Tactics.display_help: Your Accuracy and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactics.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception.
Tactics.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception with good {PowerName}.

Slash.display_target_help: The claws have reduced your Defenses.

Tear_Gas.display_help: The Tear Gas has left you choking and helpless.

Plasma_Blast.display_help: Plasma burns are hard to heal. The burns have halted your Regeneration rate.

Seeker_Drones.display_help: The Seeker Drones have Disoriented you and reduced your Damage, Accuracy and Perception range.

Air_Bomb.display_help: You have been knocked back by the explosion and are on fire.

Willie_Pete.display_help: You are on fire and burning!
